segments.text: Steven , have you any friend in London ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , my old friend Hanson lives there
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . He's one of my best friends . Our friendship formed at college . Why did you ask that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to London on business next week . But I know nothing about it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I get it . You want to find a guide , don ’ t you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , Steven . You always know what I want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t worry . I will call Hanson , and ask him to help you .
segments.speaker: S2
